name: Janisar Akhtar
bio: Java Full Stack Developer with expertise in Spring Boot, React, and MySQL. Skilled in building scalable and secure web applications. Known for problem-solving, efficiency, and delivering high-quality results.
about: Results-driven Java Full Stack Developer with strong expertise in Spring Boot, MySQL, and React. Proficient in building real-time applications, implementing APIs, and ensuring secure authentication. Experienced in integrating third-party services like Stripe, Razorpay, and Gemini APIs. Passionate about solving complex problems and delivering scalable, maintainable solutions. Eager to contribute technical expertise to dynamic teams and impactful projects.
longAbout:
Hello! I'm Janisar Akhtar, a passionate Java Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in building real-time web applications. I specialize in Java Spring Boot for backend development, React.js for front-end interfaces, and MySQL for managing databases. Throughout my B.Tech in Computer Science, I’ve worked on multiple projects, including a **Real-Time Trading Platform with AI Chatbot**, where I integrated Gemini and CoinGecko APIs for real-time cryptocurrency prices and implemented secure payment gateways using Stripe and Razorpay.

I am proficient in developing RESTful APIs, implementing Spring Security for authentication, and using modern tools like Maven, IntelliJ IDEA, and Postman for efficient development and testing. I also have experience with React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn UI for building dynamic and responsive frontends.

When solving coding challenges, I take a structured approach, breaking problems into smaller components and optimizing for performance. I enjoy participating in coding competitions and continuously learning new technologies to enhance my skills.

On a personal level, I am dedicated to my career growth, aiming for high-paying software engineering roles. I’m motivated by my family’s support and strive to make them proud through my professional success. I am also passionate about exploring new places and documenting my experiences through visual storytelling.

I am eager to contribute my skills to impactful projects and collaborate with innovative teams. Let’s connect and build something amazing together!
